text:
I discovered today that a mapper like       

  <mapper type="glob" from="pdl/*" to="*"/>

will not work on Windows because the mapper is looking for a forward slash, but 
the Windows filenames contain backslashes.
creator: dennis@arsdigita.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
This is by design. Use 

<mapper type="glob" from="pdl${file.separator}*" to="*"/>

instead.

Thanks for the quick response!  A couple remarks though:

1) This seems inconsistent since so many of the tasks take care of slash 
translation automatically.

2) Is this documented somewhere?
creator: dennis@arsdigita.com

text: will be documented in 1.4beta2 and all releases after that.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
